name: Delivery (Johan_S)
description:
There are countless mad drivers in the city. As a delivery man, use rocket, grenade and your ultimate rage skill to find your way in the chaos and deliver the food!

How to play: Move to the blue spots to pick up food and take the food to the customer. Collect as much money as possible during a day.

Control: 

WASD: move

LShift: accelerate

I: Rocket

J: Ultimate rage skill, makes you invincible

K: Grenade

L: Horn, kick vehicles away from you
